entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Our president is not very smart. He is still not wearing a mask. The covid-19 is all around him. Why is he inviting people to the WH?  The Republican don’t have much sense not to go. We are suppose to be in our home with no one come or going. Trump does not set an example! Shame!
